input.sentences: my graduation ceremony was finally here .
all my friends were excited | but still a bit nervous .
some of my friends were having more fun then others .
people were celebrating in all sorts of fun | kooky ways .
at the end of the day i was just glad to be with my family .
output.sentences: Graduation day had finally arrived, and we were ready for the ceremony.
I was nervous, but my friends were excited.
I felt better after my fun friends made me laugh.
There were all sorts of people some holding kooky balloons.
I was so glad that my family was there on this special day.
